snippet.title: Block N Load 2 - Exclusive Official New Announcement Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Block N Load 2 allows you to play, build and destroy in its Team-Based PVP Hero Shooter to win arena matches. You'll have to build traps, boosters, cover, and more to survive and be the superior team. You can also fully create your own arenas however you like for a unique experience and this trailer showcases everything you can do in Block N Load 2.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
